Intervention: patients who are BMI over 25 and receiving ampicillin/sulbactam prophylaxis
Patients who are BMI over 25 and not receive antibiotic prophylaxis
Eligibility: Women at any age with early stage breast cancer (stage I-II) and American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) score of I-II.
Ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS; stage 0 cancer),
History of receiving any antibiotics within prior 3 months,
History of reaction to study antibiotics,
Denial of signing the consent form.
Results: Number of Patients With Body Mass Index (BMI) Over 25 Who Developed Surgical Site Infection (SSI) in Groups Who Received Antibiotic Prophylaxis (Prophylaxis Group) and no Prophylaxis (No Prophylaxis Group).
Arm/Group Description: patients who are BMI over 25 and receiving ampicillin/sulbactam prophylaxis
Arm/Group Description: Patients who are BMI over 25 and not receive antibiotic prophylaxis
